attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP
attributes.review: Horrible app! After downloading it, it made my phone crash and restart! After it restarted, it’s been glitchy ever since. I hope this app gets deleted because I don’t want anyone to go through this, hopefully there’s no spy-ware on here !!

attributes.title: Terrible app!
attributes.review: I downloaded this and hacked my phone and then sent me a notification telling me to go back to Mexico!!! I’m not even Mexican! And I went to go walk my dog but this app stole my dog ugh! I can’t believe this. This app needs to be taken down! And quick!

attributes.title: Trash
attributes.review: Worst app ever. I downloaded the app to get updates about our president but it turns out (just like I thought) he is a racist, white Supremacist, homophobic piece of trash and that is all that it’s about and all he talks about is himself not the country or the better for it what so ever

attributes.title: Do not download
attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I saw it on the App Store and it asked me if I wanted to get notifications from the app! Also, it asked me for my phone number too! I do not feel comfortable giving my phone number to an orange!

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!!!!
attributes.review: Never get this app, it creates a virus on your phone. I installed it and immediately got a virus on my phone when I opened it up. The app itself is horrible and terribly made. It doesn’t work and it’s sooooooo bad. 10/10 would not recommend downloading it.

attributes.title: horrible app
attributes.review: this app is TERRIBLE 😒😒i thought it would help me get rid of all cheetos since it is lead by the head cheeto, but no!!! it put a virus on my phone and forced me to become transracial to be a happy white man. 💔💔please do not download this app unless u are ready to throw away t!k t0k and ur self esteem. but remember be happy!!!^*%++>~€

attributes.title: I-
attributes.review: The reviews that other people are saying about this app are so true. You will get your microwave and oven stolen!! I don’t know they do it tho, and the app glitches so much that I can’t even use it anymore more. Oh and The app tried to take my bed too!

attributes.title: Dissapointing🥺🥴
attributes.review: It was truely sadith to have this app on my phone😭 The content was not what I wanted :,( where is my chick-fil-a delivery? I just wanted nugs, not drugs😗👍 Pls get rid of this garbage and protect other innocent children from the orange man from FNAF🥴🙏. I was truely dissapointed in the quality and false advertising of this app☹️🐟Free the dinosaurs and protect the turtles😦😗👍🤩

attributes.title: This app is glitchy do not download!!!!
attributes.review: Since downloading I haven’t been able to open the app without it crashing and my phone freezes after trying to close the app

attributes.title: Health Risk
attributes.review:
Some guys have all the luck. I was born with glass bones and paper skin. Every morning I break my legs, and every afternoon I break my arms. At night, I lie awake in agony until my heart attacks put me to sleep. 

And this app made me fall down my stairs while a couple gentlemen were trying to sell me chocolate.
